titleStmt.title: An Account of the award of execution of death against Sr. Thomas Armstrong who received sentence of death at the Kings-Bench-Bar at Westminster to be drawn, hang'd and quarter'd, on the 14th of this instant June 1684, upon the motion of Mr. Attorney General, forasmuch as the said Sr. Thomas stood attainted of high-treason by out-lawry, for conspiring and contriving the death of the King and the antient established government of this kingdom to subvert, &c.

An Account of the award of execution of death against Sr. Thomas Armstrong who received sentence of death at the Kings-Bench-Bar at Westminster to be drawn, hang'd and quarter'd, on the 14th of this instant June 1684, upon the motion of Mr. Attorney General, forasmuch as the said Sr. Thomas stood attainted of high-treason by out-lawry, for conspiring and contriving the death of the King and the antient established government of this kingdom to subvert, &c.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
